name: Galley (Unearthed Arcana)
speed: 4 miles per hour (96 miles per day)
conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, incapacitated, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, stunned, unconscious

trait.name: Control:
text: Move up to the speed of one of its movement components, with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the Galley (Unearthed Arcana) can't turn.

trait.name: Movement:
text: Hit Points: 100; -10 ft. speed per 25 damage taken
Locomotion (water): sails, speed 35 ft.; 15 ft. while sailing into the wind; 50 ft. while sailing with the wind.

trait.name: Movement:
text: Hit Points: 100; -5 ft. speed per 25 damage taken

action.name: Weapons:
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. 16 (3d10) piercing damage.

action.name: Weapons:
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 200/800 ft. (can't hit targets within 60 ft. of it), one target. 27 (5d10) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Weapons:
text: The Galley (Unearthed Arcana) has advantage on all saving throws relating to crashing when it crashes into a creature or object, and any damage it suffers from the crash is instead applied to the ram. These benefits do not apply if a vehicle crashes into the Galley (Unearthed Arcana).

description: Source: Unearthed Arcana: Of Ships And Sea p. 2
